C o m m e n t: The vast distribution of
Micrillus testaceus
is of the Holo-Mediterranean type and ranges from the Iberian Peninsula and Morocco in the west to South European Russia and the Middle East in the east. The currently known distribution is illustrated in Map 1. For a detailed account of the taxonomy, distribution, and natural history see ASSING (2008) .
